name: XBit Jumper
description:
For Web browser to play, Id recommend Fire Fox. Chrome runs Slowly

Space platformer about jumping high into space.

 Made for the 1-bit Game Jam.

Very small game, could be beaten in 5 minutes or take 2 hours.

First Game I have ever made, Hope it keeps you a little bit entertained.

Everything in this game is personally made by me, but you could probably tell!

If I could start again, I would have chosen a black background with white everything else
